Description: Limestone ostracon: On one side only, four lines of a text recording the payment to the sculptor Ipuy for work done on a coffin; dated in a year 6.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: K.Kitchen, 'Ramesside Inscriptions' VII (Oxford 1989), 171 (erroneously called O.Touche H 3).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (136406) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/136406)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Robert Curzon, 14th Baron Zouche
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Robert Curzon, 14th Baron Zouche
